product_name: Vasque Taku GTX Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: Lightweight and all-leather don't often go together, but the waterproof Vasque Taku GTX Hiking Boots are built to be lean with the durability of an off-trail bruiser for your day hiking adventures. Waterproof nubuck leather uppers have GORE-TEX(R) waterproof, breathable inserts that are guaranteed to keep your feet dry when you're hiking through puddles. Vasque Taku GTX Hiking Boots have EVA midsoles to cushion impacts. Thermoplastic urethane shanks provide good support for long days on your feet. Low-profile lacing system ensures a good fit. Vibram(R) Neo Day Hiker outsoles provide good traction on slick surfaces; broad-based lugs are strategically situated to maximize the flexibility of the boots.
short_description: Lightweight and all-leather don't often go together, but the waterproof Vasque Taku GTX Hiking Boots are built to be lean with the durability of an off-trail bruiser for your day hiking adventures.
